name: ED WYNN WANTS TO GO TO COOL HELL
name_original: ED WYNN WANTS TO GO TO COOL HELL
description:
A self-indulgence..

👻 ED WYNN WANTS TO GO TO COOL HELL 👻

Deceased comedian and occasional character actor Ed Wynn is tired of being dead. He wants to go to "Cool Hell" - and you've gotta get him there!

my Halloween 2018 project, and my first twine since IN THE ARMS OF THE NIGHT!

FEATURING:

  • The genuine ghost of Ed Wynn, as depicted by seren krakens
  • Words and images by me
  • Over 20 characters to encounter and infuriate
  • 3 endings!

This game is designed to be played in a maximised or full-screen browser; images may not display properly in a smaller window.
